messages.message: Going to redeploy api-server for Crafting Cyp to deploy Victor's billing fix (:ty:). This should fix the "failed to create org" issue in `make sandbox > create user and organization` step. https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1747848175901439

<!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5> Api-server failed to start, because `observability-agent` failed with:
```http conn serve: container "observability-agent" in pod "deployment-api-server-8544cdd48b-wcphk" is waiting to start: trying and failing to pull image```
https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/deployment-manager/dashboard/deployments/apps/v1/api-server
Can you take a look? Thank you!
Hmm I guess when you select to only include api-server it doesn’t know to rebuild observability-agent
I’ll edit the deployment in k8s to just use the same obs-agent image as other services for now

> when you select to only include api-server it doesn’t know to rebuild observability-agent
Should I manually include observability-agent then?

This wasn’t an issue for other sidecar containers like envoy-proxy or stats-collector bc we know to rebuild those every time. I think we’ll need to update Jenkins to also rebuild observability agent every deploy cc @abhijnan
Looks like all api-server pods are healthy now
Thank you, @William Helmrath, for fixing it! Cypress CI is restored now. Please re-run it if your PR was blocked
